# Verbosity Positive Cases (Should Warn)

Each line has 2+ filler phrases and should trigger a warning.

1. In order to improve, it is important to practice regularly.
2. Due to the fact that time is limited, in order to succeed we must prioritize.
3. It should be noted that in terms of performance, the system is fast.
4. As a matter of fact, in order to understand, you should read the docs.
5. In light of the fact that bugs exist, it is important to test.
6. Basically, in order to deploy, you need to push to main.
7. Generally speaking, in terms of architecture, microservices work well.
8. It goes without saying that in order to scale, you need resources.
9. Needless to say, it is important to monitor production.
10. Essentially, in order to debug, you need logs.
11. For the purpose of testing, it is important to mock dependencies.
12. At this point in time, in order to ship, we need approval.
13. With regard to security, it is important to encrypt data.
14. On a regular basis, in order to maintain quality, we review code.
15. In the event that errors occur, it is important to handle them.
16. Fundamentally, in terms of design, simplicity wins.
17. In order to collaborate, it is important to document decisions.
18. Due to the fact that complexity grows, in terms of testing, automation helps.
19. It should be noted that in order to learn, practice is key.
20. As a matter of fact, in terms of reliability, redundancy matters.
